body:
yes i forgot it too, use :
RAPATH=c:/ray/lib;.


ATTENTION you must use / and not \ in the RAYPATH variable


very nice your work in the EZCT, i would like we'd do it spain , but our
architecture schools are yet with lightscape    :-)
